title: Do 1000th games with Rioters still happen?
body: A mate has recently won his 1000th game and wondered if Rioters still join in on 1000th games?

replies.body: Tell your mate to add me in game!

Yup.
But if he thinks he missed it, might still try a "can i play a game with rito" thread. Sometimes it works even if it's not a milestone.

i still got my 1337th win with a rioter, however.
they do, but. you have to add them in game and ask, OCE boards are dead to them

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cGvOpvA3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-10T11:49:28.623+0000)
>
> they do, but. you have to add them in game and ask, OCE boards are dead to them

Not true, they just take the time to respond to posts that are directed at them and/or they are interested in
that must be why it takes 6 months to respond to help questions then
I played my 1000th win and my 1999th game with Riot not too long ago so im assuming it still happens.
